verbs.description: [ARG0: New York 's attorney general] [V: filed] [ARG1: suit] [ARG3: against President Donald Trump and his three eldest children] , [ARGM-ADV: alleging ' persistently illegal conduct ' at the president 's personal charity] .

[ARG0: New York 's attorney general] filed suit against President Donald Trump and his three eldest children , [V: alleging] [ARG1: ' persistently illegal conduct ' at the president 's personal charity] .
